comment.text: This translation key is used for the "Sync users" label on a button that triggers LDAP synchronization. The button appears in a sync container component and is disabled when LDAP integration is not enabled or UID is disabled.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation 'Uživatelé synchronizace' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Sync users'. It translates to 'Users synchronization', which is awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like 'Synchronizovat uživatele' (Synchronize users) or 'Uživatelská synchronizace' (User synchronization).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Սինխրոնիզացված օգտվողներ" (Sinxronizatsvad ogtvoghner) literally translates to 'Synchronized users'. The intended meaning of 'Sync users' is more accurately conveyed as a process of synchronization, not a state of being synchronized.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Օգտվողների համապարակշակում" (Ogtvoghneri hamaparaksakoum) or "Օգտվողների սինխրոնիզացիա" (Ogtvoghneri sinkronizatsia) which better reflects the action of synchronizing users.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ຊິງຂໍ້ມູນຜູ້ໃຊ້' literally translates to 'take user data'. While understandable, a more natural and accurate translation of 'Sync users' would convey the meaning of synchronizing or updating user information.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອັບເດດຂໍ້ມູນຜູ້ໃຊ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශීලකයින්' (parishiilakayin) is a less common and potentially incorrect word for 'users'. It implies 'enthusiasts' or 'devotees' rather than 'users'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශ්‍රමකරුවන් (parishramakaran) or ඊළඟ පරිශීලකයින් (eelanage parishilakayin) might be a more appropriate translation of 'users' in this context, though the latter still has the enthusiast connotation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'සමමුහුර්ත කරන්න' (samamuhurta kanna) is a valid Sinhala word, it translates to 'synchronize' which is a bit formal. 'නැවතsynchronize කරන්න' is more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලකයින් නැවතsynchronize කරන්න (parishiilakayin nawaath synchronize kanna)
